response.overview: Shocking, hilarious, madcap scenarios involving home videos found in dumpsters: mind-blowing musical footage featuring Don, the musical Indian Gangster; Crispin Glover; Mr. T; and of course Steve Via's surprise birthday video from one lovely quiffing lady. Plus, insane Japanese Game shows involving contestants catapulted off cliffs and large breasted ladies disrobing for the judges to weigh in their verdict! There's even a penis pump infomercial containing full demonstration and background music. Found computer animated Gay porn that is so shocking and hilarious it is certain to be played again and again! Not to mention the Six Million Dollar Man doll anally drilling G.I Joe in the found classic "Major Repair Job"! And, a masturbating walrus. Plus a whole lot more!! We guarantee this video will become your favorite compilation of weirdness! You can now own or stream this video for your own party favor certain to please even the most jaded crowd!
response.tagline: You won't believe your eyes when you see what we have found on video!
response.title: Lost & Found Video Night Volume 1
